ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Weapon selections..
ygData.msgSnippet: No question. Ebon Razor in off hand, Yak in main hand. Drae ... From: hho@bang-olufsen.dk [mailto:hho@bang-olufsen.dk] Sent: Monday, August 28, 2000 4:01 AM
ygData.messageBody:
No question.

Ebon Razor in off hand, Yak in main hand.

Drae

-----Original Message-----
From: hho@... [mailto:hho@...]
Sent: Monday, August 28, 2000 4:01 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Weapon selections..


Hi all,
Well its time for me to call upon the experinced souls here to get some
advice
regarding weapons. I have the following weapons at my disposal:
- Ebon Razor (Primary only) Damage 9, Delay 25, +4 fire, cold & magic prot.
Wt.
3.5.
- Short Sword of the Ykesha: Damage 8, Delay 24, Weight 4.5. Effect of
Ykesha
(75 point direct damage spell)
- Staff of Writhing 9/33 Diret proc Damage 48
- Bladed thullian claws (Primary only). 5/19
- Silvery War Axe 6/22
Currently Im wielding the Ebon Razor and the yak and I think my damage is
better
than with the yak in primary and Silvery in off hand. But I have my doubts.
Im
not satisfied with the yak being placed in my offhand. Do any of you have
suggestions for a better weapon setup?
I have been thinking of getting a second yak, but I find the proc is
resisted
quite a lot by kunark mobs atleast.

Regards
Musiker(x) Silverdrum, bard of the 38th song, bertox

with the subject submissions.
